SELECT
STK_ID , CASE WHEN IS_CTRL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END CONTROL , NVL(DISCONTINUE,0) DISCONTINUED , STK_CODE , STK_DESC , TO_CHAR(CTRL_START_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') START_DATE , TO_CHAR(CTRL_START_DT,'HH:MI AM') START_TIME , TO_CHAR(CTRL_END_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') END_DATE , TO_CHAR(CTRL_END_DT,'HH:MI AM') END_TIME
FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_TYPE_ID = 61
AND IS_CTRL = #{cmbControl}
AND UPPER(STK_CODE) LIKE '%'|| #{productCode} ||'%'
AND UPPER(STK_DESC) LIKE '%'|| #{productName} ||'%'
AND TO_DATE( #{effectDt} || #{effectTm} ,'DD/MM/YYYYHH:MI AM') BETWEEN CTRL_START_DT AND CTRL_END_DT
AND TO_DATE( #{effectDt} ,'DD/MM/YYYY') BETWEEN CTRL_START_DT AND CTRL_END_DT
AND STK_ID = #{stkId}
ORDER BY STK_CTGRY_ID, STK_ID, STK_DESC

SELECT
STK_ID, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, SRV_PAC_ID, APP_TYPE
FROM ( SELECT T1.STK_ID, T1.STK_CODE, T1.STK_DESC, T2.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID SRV_PAC_ID, 66 APP_TYPE FROM SYS0026M T1 JOIN SAL0082D T2 ON T2.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID = T1.STK_ID AND T2.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 WHERE T1.STK_TYPE_ID = 61 AND T1.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND (T1.DISCONTINUE = 1 OR T2.DISCONTINUE = 1) UNION SELECT T1.STK_ID, T1.STK_CODE, T1.STK_DESC, T2.SRV_MEM_PAC_ID SRV_PAC_ID, 67 APP_TYPE FROM SYS0026M T1 JOIN SAL0092M T2 ON T2.SRV_MEM_ITM_STK_ID = T1.STK_ID AND T2.SRV_MEM_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 WHERE T1.STK_TYPE_ID = 61 AND T1.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND (T1.DISCONTINUE = 1 OR T2.DISCONTINUE = 1) ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND APP_TYPE = #{appTypeId} AND SRV_PAC_ID = #{pacId} AND STK_ID = #{stkId}

WITH SOM AS( SELECT SOM.SALES_ORD_ID, SOM.PROMO_ID, SOD.ITM_STK_ID,SOM.SALES_DT, SOM.STUS_CODE_ID FROM SAL0001D SOM JOIN SAL0002D SOD ON SOD.SALES_ORD_ID = SOM.SALES_ORD_ID WHERE SOM.STUS_CODE_ID NOT IN (8,10) AND NVL(SOM.PRE_ORD_ID,0) = 0 ) SELECT STK_ID , PROMO_ID , CTRL_QUOTA , EKEYIN_COUNT , ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT , EKEYIN_COUNT + ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT TOT2 FROM ( SELECT S.STK_ID , PD.PROMO_ID , PD.CTRL_QUOTA , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAL0213M EKEY WHERE EKEY.ITM_STK_ID = S.STK_ID AND EKEY.PROMO_ID = PD.PROMO_ID AND EKEY.REQST_DT BETWEEN S.CTRL_START_DT AND S.CTRL_END_DT AND EKEY.STUS_ID NOT IN (8,10)) EKEYIN_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOM WHERE SOM.ITM_STK_ID = S.STK_ID AND SOM.PROMO_ID = PD.PROMO_ID AND SOM.SALES_DT BETWEEN S.CTRL_START_DT AND S.CTRL_END_DT AND SOM.STUS_CODE_ID NOT IN (8,10) ) ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT FROM SYS0026M S JOIN SAL0018D PD ON PD.PROMO_ITM_STK_ID = S.STK_ID WHERE S.STK_ID = #{stkId} AND PD.PROMO_ID = #{promoId} AND S.IS_CTRL = 1 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN CTRL_START_DT AND CTRL_END_DT AND PD.CTRL_FLAG = 1 ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND (EKEYIN_COUNT + ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT) > CTRL_QUOTA
AND (EKEYIN_COUNT + ADMIN_KEYIN_COUNT) +1 > CTRL_QUOTA

SELECT TM.PRC_REQST_ID, TM.APP_TYPE_ID, TM.STK_ID, STK.STK_TYPE_ID, STK.STK_CODE, STK.STK_DESC, SP.MEM_PAC_ID, CASE WHEN TM.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 66 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = 367 and CODE = TO_CHAR(TM.MEM_PAC_ID)) WHEN TM.APP_TYPE_ID = 67 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 67 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = 368 and CODE = TO_CHAR(TM.MEM_PAC_ID)) WHEN TM.APP_TYPE_ID = 1412 THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = 1412 and DISAB = 0 AND CODE_MASTER_ID = 10) ||' - '|| (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = 370 and CODE = TO_CHAR(TM.MEM_PAC_ID)) ELSE NULL END AS CODE_NAME, ( SELECT code_name FROM sys0013m WHERE code_id = stk.stk_ctgry_id ) CTGRY, ( SELECT code_name FROM sys0013m WHERE code_id = stk.stk_type_id ) TYPE, STUS.NAME AS APPV_STUS, APPV.USER_NAME AS APPROVER, TO_CHAR(TM.APPV_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS APPV_DT, TM.REMARK, CRT.USER_NAME AS CREATOR, TO_CHAR(TM.CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CRT_DT FROM SAL0357M TM JOIN SYS0026M STK ON STK.STK_ID = TM.STK_ID JOIN SYS0047M CRT ON CRT.USER_ID = TM.CRT_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M APPV ON APPV.USER_ID = TM.APPV_USER_ID JOIN SYS0038M STUS ON STUS.STUS_CODE_ID = TM.APPV_STUS LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0016M SP ON (SP.APP_TYPE_ID = TM.APP_TYPE_ID) AND SP.STK_ID = TM.STK_ID AND SP.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND SP.MEM_PAC_ID = TM.MEM_PAC_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND STK.STK_CTGRY_ID in
#{item}
AND STK.STK_TYPE_ID in
#{item}
AND STK.STK_DESC like '%'|| #{stkNm} || '%'
AND STK.STK_CODE like #{stkCd} || '%'
AND TM.APPV_STUS = #{status}
AND TM.CRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#{createDt1}||' 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
AND TM.CRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#{createDt2} ||' 23:59:59', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY STK.STK_CODE

SELECT
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, 0 AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, NVL(AMT, 0) MRENTAL, NVL(PRC_RPF, 0) PRICERPF, 0 PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, 0 MRENTAL, 0 PRICERPF, 0 PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, 0 MRENTAL, 0 PRICERPF, 0 PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, 0 MRENTAL, NVL(PRC_RPF, 0) PRICERPF, NVL(PRC_CHRG, 0) PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
FROM SAL0357M WHERE PRC_REQST_ID = #{reqstId}

SELECT ROW_NO, PRC_ID, MEM_PAC_ID, STK_ID, UOM_ID, UOM_CONV, APP_TYPE_ID, NVL(PRIOD, 0) PRIOD, STUS_CODE_ID, CRT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') CRT_DT,
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, NVL(PRC_PV, 0) PRICEPV, NVL(AMT, 0) MRENTAL, NVL(PRC_RPF, 0) PRICERPF, 0 PENALTY, NVL(TRADE_IN_PV, 0) TRADEINPV
NVL(PRC_COSTING, 0) PRICECOST, NVL(AMT, 0) AMT, 0 PRICEPV, 0 MRENTAL, 0 PRICERPF, NVL(PRC_CHRG, 0) PENALTY, 0 TRADEINPV
FROM LOG0058D WHERE 1=1 AND APP_TYPE_ID = #{appTypeId} AND STK_ID = #{stkId} AND MEM_PAC_ID = #{memPacId}
AND STUS_CODE_ID = 1
ORDER BY ROW_NO DESC
